definition: Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
Hanyu Pinyin, the romanization system used in the PRC since the 1960s

pinyin: Shang1 wu4 Han4 yu3 Kao3 shi4

definition: Hanyu Da Zidian, one of the most comprehensive Chinese character dictionaries with 54,678 (and later 60,370) entries, first published between 1986-1990
Hanyu Da Cidian, the largest Chinese dictionary, with over 375,000 word entries, first published 1986-1994

pinyin: Han4 yu3 Shui3 ping2 Kao3 shi4

sentences.english: Europeanization is the output of language contact between the English and Chinese language.
sentences.chinese: 漢語的歐化現象是鴉片戰爭以來英漢語言接觸的產物。

sentences.english: Europeanization is the output of language contact between the English and Chinese language.
sentences.chinese: 漢語的歐化現象是鴉片戰爭以來英漢語言接觸的產物。

sentences.english: Retroflex suffixation in Chinese is a phenomenon of syllable merger.
sentences.chinese: 漢語兒化是一種音節融合現象。

sentences.english: MHK is the shortened form of the Chinese Proficiency Test for Minorities in China.
sentences.chinese: MHK是中國少數民族漢語水平等級考試的簡稱。

sentences.english: The aim of this thesis is to compare and study the differences of phatic language between English and Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 本論文旨在對比研究應酬語在英漢語中的區別。

sentences.english: This difference is caused by different attributes of English and Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 它們的差異是由英漢語不同的語言屬性決定的。

sentences.english: Ambiguity from the negative scope is much more in English than Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 英語中因否定範圍不清而導致的歧義遠多勝於漢語。

sentences.english: Contrastive study of syntax structure of yes-no questions in Russian and Chinese is made in part two.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分主要是俄漢語是非問句的句法結構對比研究。

sentences.english: In the evening, he learns Chinese from Lily and Xiao Yang.
sentences.chinese: 到是晚上，他向李莉和肖楊學漢語。

sentences.english: I'm going to buy some story-books and a Chinese-English and English-Chinese dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 我要去買些故事書和一箇中國的英國和英漢語詞典。

sentences.english: Numerals are used in flexible and diversified ways in Chinese idioms.
sentences.chinese: 數詞在漢語成語中的使用是靈活多樣的。

sentences.english: Lettered words has the qualifications to enter Chinese dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 字母詞有資格進入漢語詞典。

sentences.english: In Indonesia, ONLY the Chinese-language is forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 在印泥，只有漢語是被禁止的。

sentences.english: There are sharp differences in the suprasegmental structures between Mandarin and English.
sentences.chinese: 漢語與英語在超音段結構系統中有很大差異。

sentences.english: Studies on historical phonetic change of Chinese is traditionally called Chinese phonology in China.
sentences.chinese: 漢語歷史語音變化的研究，在我國傳統稱爲音韻學。

sentences.english: The adverb of mood is of a sub-category in mod ern Chinese adverbial wo rds.
sentences.chinese: 語氣副詞是現代漢語副詞的一個次類。
